00025 /* Power assignments */
00026 #define MOTOR_POWER_FAST      100
00027 #define MOTOR_POWER_MODERATE  75
00028 #define MOTOR_POWER_SLOW      30
00029 
00030 /* MOTOR PID */
00031 #define MOTOR_P               450
00032 #define MOTOR_I               0
00033 #define MOTOR_D               0
00034 
00035 /* Motor assignments */
00036 #define MOTOR_TILT            OUT_C
00037 #define MOTOR_STRIDE          OUT_B
00038 #define MOTOR_NECK            OUT_A
00039 
00040 #define NECK_CYCLE            2160
00041 
00042 /* Sensor assignments */
00043 #define TOUCH_SENSOR          IN_1
00044 #define SOUND_SENSOR          IN_2
00045 #define LIGHT_SENSOR          IN_3
00046 #define RANGE_SENSOR          IN_4
00047 
00048 /* Sensor Offset (in cycle percentage) from Neutral alignment */
00049 #define TOUCH_SENSOR_OFFSET     -25     /* 1/4 Cycle ahead of neutral */
00050 #define LIGHT_SENSOR_OFFSET      12     /* 1/10 Cycle before neutral */
00051 
00052 /* Sound sensor threshold for detecting claps */
00053 #define SOUND_SENSOR_THRESHOLD   60     /* Threshold for sound detection */
00054 
00055 /* Range sensor threshold for detecting obstacle */
00056 #define RANGE_SENSOR_THRESHOLD   50     /* cm */
00057 
00058 /* Light sensor threshold below which proximity is confirmed */
00059 #define LIGHT_SENSOR_PROXIMITY_THRESHOLD 40
00060 
00061 /* Tolerance degrees for cycle caliberation. Cycle count will be trimmed */
00062 #define CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE     90
00063 
00064 /* Move commands */
00065 #define MOVE_STOP             0
00066 #define MOVE_FORWARD          1
00067 #define MOVE_LEFT             2
00068 #define MOVE_RIGHT            3
00069 #define NUM_COMMANDS          4
00070 
00071 /* Move States */
00072 #define LTRF                  0    /* Left tilted, right foot ahead */
00073 #define CLF                   1    /* Center tilted, left foot ahead */
00074 #define REST                  2    /* Center tilted, feets centered */
00075 #define CRF                   3    /* Center tilted, right foot ahead */
00076 #define RTLF                  4    /* Right tilted, left foot ahead */
00077 #define NUM_STATES            5
00078 
00079 /* Action elements index */
00080 #define ACTION_ELEMENT_STRIDE_FIRST  0  /* If true, stride first, else tilt first */
00081 #define ACTION_ELEMENT_TILT_AMOUNT   1  /* -100 to +100 percentage */
00082 #define ACTION_ELEMENT_STRIDE_AMOUNT 2  /* -100 to +100 percentage */
00083 #define NUM_ELEMENTS                 3
00084 
00085 /* Macro to retrieve action elements from above state transition action table */
00086 #define GetActionElement(int prevState, int nextState, int element) \
00087      stateTransitionAction[prevState * NUM_STATES * NUM_ELEMENTS \
00088                            + nextState * NUM_ELEMENTS \
00089                            + element]
00090 
00091 /* Executed upon entering a state */
00092 int stateTransitionAction[] = {
00093 /* ---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 /*          |  (nextState)                                                    */
00095 /* prevState|   LTRF        CLF           REST         CRF          RTLF      */
00096 /* ---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* LTRF     |*/ 0,  0,  0,   0,-25, 50,   1,-25, 25,   0,-25,  0,   0,-50, 50,
00098 /* CLF      |*/ 0, 25,-50,   0,  0,  0,   0,  0,-25,   0,  0,-50,   0,-25,  0,
00099 /* REST     |*/ 0, 25,-25,   0,  0, 25,   0,  0,  0,   0,  0,-25,   0,-25, 25,
00100 /* CRF      |*/ 0, 25,  0,   0,  0, 50,   0,  0, 25,   0,  0,  0,   0,-25, 50,
00101 /* RTLF     |*/ 0, 50,-50,   0, 25,  0,   1, 25,-25,   0, 25,-50,   0,  0,  0,
00102 /* ---------|------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103 };
00104 
00105 /* State transitions table */
00106 int stateTransition[] = {
00107 /* ---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00108 /*          |   MOVE_STOP  MOVE_FORWARD  MOVE_LEFT  MOVE_RIGHT */
00109 /* ---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00110 /* LTRF     |*/   REST,      RTLF,       CLF,      RTLF,
00111 /* CLF      |*/   REST,      LTRF,       LTRF,     RTLF,
00112 /* REST     |*/   REST,      LTRF,       LTRF,     RTLF,
00113 /* CRF      |*/   REST,      LTRF,       LTRF,     RTLF,
00114 /* RTLF     |*/   REST,      LTRF,       LTRF,     CRF,
00115 /* ---------|-----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00116 };
00117 
00118 mutex moveMutex;
00119 int moveCommand = MOVE_STOP;
00120 int moveState = REST;
00121 int tiltCycleCount, strideCycleCount;
00122 
00123 void startMotor(int motor, int power)
00124 {
00125      SetOutput(motor, OutputMode, OUT_MODE_MOTORON | OUT_MODE_BRAKE);
00126      SetOutput(motor, Power, power);
00127      SetOutput(motor, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_MODE | UF_UPDATE_SPEED |
00128                UF_UPDATE_RESET_BLOCK_COUNT);
00129      SetOutput(motor, RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_RUNNING);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void stopMotor(int motor)
00133 {
00134      SetOutput(motor, RunState, OUT_RUNSTATE_IDLE);
00135      SetOutput(motor, OutputMode, 0);
00136      SetOutput(motor, Power, 0);
00137      SetOutput(motor, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_SPEED);
00138 }
00139 
00140 int RotateAngle(int motor, int power, int angle, int PValue, int IValue, int DValue)
00141 {
00142      int pidScale = 1000;
00143      int samplePeriod = 20; /* ms */
00144      int dt = 1; /* 1dt == 20 msec */
00145      int outputScale = 2;
00146      int I = 0;
00147      int lastError = 0;
00148      int steadyStateCount = 0;
00149 
00150      /* Speed is evaluated in the loop below */
00151      startMotor(motor, 0);
00152 
00153      while(steadyStateCount < 5)
00154      {
00155          int absPower = Abs(power);
00156          int error = angle - GetOutput(motor, BlockTachoCount);
00157 
00158          /* If error hasn't changed for last 5 samples, quit */
00159          if ((error - lastError) == 0)
00160              steadyStateCount++;
00161 
00162          int P = PValue * error / pidScale;
00163          I += IValue * error * dt / pidScale;
00164          int D = (DValue / dt) * (error - lastError) / pidScale;
00165          int output = outputScale * (P + I + D);
00166          if (output > absPower) output = absPower;
00167          if (output < -absPower) output = -absPower;
00168          SetOutput(motor, Power, output);
00169          SetOutput(motor, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_SPEED);
00170          lastError = error;
00171          Wait(dt * samplePeriod);
00172      }
00173      stopMotor(motor);
00174      return lastError;
00175 }
00176 
00177 int GetSensorProximity (int sensor)
00178 {
00179     if (sensor == TOUCH_SENSOR)
00180        return Sensor(TOUCH_SENSOR);
00181     if (Sensor(LIGHT_SENSOR) < LIGHT_SENSOR_PROXIMITY_THRESHOLD)
00182        return 1;
00183     else
00184        return 0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 int CaliberateMotor(int motor, int sensor, int postAlignmentPercentage)
00188 {
00189     int extremeTachoMin;
00190     int extremeTachoMax;
00191     int cycleCountMin;
00192     int cycleCountMax;
00193     int cycleCount;
00194     int alignDegrees;
00195 
00196     /* Start motor and monitor sensor for rythm cycle */
00197     startMotor(motor, MOTOR_POWER_FAST);
00198      
00199     /*vxbxcds21111 First let the sensor get out of active state */
00200     while (GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00201      
00202     /* Wait for sensor to activate */
00203     while (!GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00204     
00205     /* Start both extreme count and cycle count */
00206     extremeTachoMin = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00207     cycleCountMin = extremeTachoMin;
00208     
00209     /* Wait for sensor to deactivate */
00210     while (GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00211 
00212     /* end count */
00213     extremeTachoMax = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00214 
00215     /* Wait for sensor to activate again */
00216     while (!GetSensorProximity(sensor));
00217 
00218     /* End cycle count */
00219     cycleCountMax = GetOutput(motor, TachoCount);
00220     
00221     /* Stop the motor */
00222     stopMotor(motor);
00223     
00224     /* Correct any error within cycle count */
00225     cycleCount = cycleCountMax - cycleCountMin;
00226     int errorCycleCount = cycleCount % CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE;
00227     if (errorCycleCount < CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE/2)
00228        cycleCount -= errorCycleCount;
00229     else
00230        cycleCount += CALIBERATION_ERROR_TOLERANCE - errorCycleCount;
00231     
00232     /* Align the moter to neutral */
00233     /* Move the tacho limit to neutralAlignment + 1/2 extreme sensor period */
00234     alignDegrees = (cycleCount * postAlignmentPercentage)/100 +
00235                     (extremeTachoMax - extremeTachoMin)/2;
00236     RotateAngle(motor, MOTOR_POWER_FAST, alignDegrees, MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00237 
00238     return cycleCount;
00239 }
00240 
00241 task Movement()
00242 {
00243      while(true)
00244      {
00245          int command = moveCommand;
00246          int nextState = stateTransition[moveState * NUM_COMMANDS + command];
00247 
00248          /* Demultiplex state data */
00249          /* Each tilt/stride fraction is 1/8 of cycle */
00250          int strideFirst =    GetActionElement(moveState, nextState,
00251                                                ACTION_ELEMENT_STRIDE_FIRST);
00252          int tiltFraction =   GetActionElement(moveState, nextState,
00253                                                ACTION_ELEMENT_TILT_AMOUNT);
00254          int strideFraction = GetActionElement(moveState, nextState,
00255                                                ACTION_ELEMENT_STRIDE_AMOUNT);
00256 
00257          if (tiltFraction && !strideFirst)
00258              RotateAngle(MOTOR_TILT, MOTOR_POWER_FAST,
00259                          (tiltCycleCount * tiltFraction)/100,
00260                          MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00261          if (strideFraction)
00262              RotateAngle(MOTOR_STRIDE, MOTOR_POWER_FAST,
00263                          (strideCycleCount * strideFraction)/100,
00264                          MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00265          if (tiltFraction && strideFirst)
00266              RotateAngle(MOTOR_TILT, MOTOR_POWER_FAST,
00267                          (tiltCycleCount * tiltFraction)/100,
00268                          MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00269           if (moveState == nextState)
00270               Wait(1000);
00271           moveState = nextState;
00272      }
00273 }
00274 
00275 task Navigation()
00276 {
00277     while(true)
00278     {
00279         /* Continue turning left as long as there is an obstacle in front */
00280         if(SensorUS(RANGE_SENSOR) < RANGE_SENSOR_THRESHOLD)
00281         {
00282             Acquire(moveMutex);
00283             if (moveCommand == MOVE_FORWARD)
00284             {
00285                 moveCommand = MOVE_LEFT;
00286             }
00287             Release(moveMutex);
00288         }
00289         else /* Go straight ahead if there is no obstacle any more */
00290         {
00291             Acquire(moveMutex);
00292             if (moveCommand == MOVE_LEFT)
00293             {
00294                 moveCommand = MOVE_FORWARD;
00295             }
00296             Release(moveMutex);
00297         }
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 task CommandCenter()
00302 {
00303     while(true)
00304     {
00305         while(Sensor(SOUND_SENSOR) < SOUND_SENSOR_THRESHOLD) Wait(20);
00306         Acquire(moveMutex);
00307         if (moveCommand == MOVE_STOP)    /* First clap to move */
00308         {
00309             moveCommand = MOVE_FORWARD;
00310         }
00311         else
00312         {
00313             moveCommand = MOVE_STOP;      /* Second clap to stop */
00314         }
00315         Release(moveMutex);
00316         Wait(1000);
00317     }
00318 }
00319 
00320 task main ()
00321 {
00322      SetSensorTouch(TOUCH_SENSOR);
00323      SetSensorLight(LIGHT_SENSOR);
00324      SetSensorSound(SOUND_SENSOR);
00325      SetSensorLowspeed(RANGE_SENSOR);
00326      
00327      /* Give user time to get out of way */
00328      Wait (1000);
00329      
00330      /* Calibrate robot position and determine tilt and stride cycles */
00331      tiltCycleCount = CaliberateMotor(MOTOR_TILT, TOUCH_SENSOR, 0);
00332      strideCycleCount = CaliberateMotor(MOTOR_STRIDE, LIGHT_SENSOR, 0);
00333      
00334      /* Bring to neutral */
00335      RotateAngle(MOTOR_STRIDE, MOTOR_POWER_FAST,
00336                  strideCycleCount * (LIGHT_SENSOR_OFFSET)/100,
00337                  MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00338      RotateAngle(MOTOR_TILT, MOTOR_POWER_FAST,
00339                  tiltCycleCount * (TOUCH_SENSOR_OFFSET)/100,
00340                  MOTOR_P, MOTOR_I, MOTOR_D);
00341 
00342      start Navigation;
00343      start Movement;
00344      start CommandCenter;
00345 }
